```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
SCF <- read.csv(file.path(str_remove(getwd(), "/Class Notes"), "/Book Data/TermLife.csv"))
consumer <- SCF %>%
  filter(FACE>0)
```

```{r}
consumer <- consumer %>%
  mutate(LNINCOME = log(INCOME),
         LNFACE = log(FACE))

consumerReg <- lm(LNFACE ~ LNINCOME+EDUCATION+NUMHH+as.factor(MARSTAT), data=consumer)
summary(consumerReg)
```

```{r}
consumer <- consumer %>%
  mutate(MARSTATFAC=as.factor(MARSTAT))

contrasts(consumer$MARSTATFAC)=contr.sum

consumerReg2 <- lm(LNFACE ~ LNINCOME+EDUCATION+NUMHH+MARSTATFAC, data=consumer)

summary(consumerReg2)
```
